title: PagerDuty for Datadog
description:
PagerDuty’s widgets allow you to view critical incident context all in the same place while working on incident resolution
Perform incident actions from the widgets: -Acknowledge and Resolve incidents


Incident discovery and action: Arms responders with knowledge of ongoing incidents within PagerDuty and gives them the ability to perform key actions such as acknowledge, resolve without having to context switch
Identify probable origin for incidents: Pinpoints which incidents were the likely origin of an issue to quickly narrow down search space. Recommendations are determined through past patterns.
Rapid root-cause identification: Proven AI-powered analysis quickly identifies recent suspicious changes, and related incidents, help responders hone in on the root-cause

Teams can view the service status dashboard directly from Datadog to get a quick, real-time view of their team’s system health. 
Users can manually trigger an incident from the PagerDuty Datadog Marketplace if they identify an issue that they know the engineering team will want to look at right away.
The Widget displays the current status of key business services and their impacting business services to get complete context while working on incidents.
Improves communication between response teams and stakeholders during incidents.

definition.content:
- View critical incident context all in the same place while working on incident resolution. 
- Perform incident actions such as acknowledging and resolving incidents
- Discover incidents by arming responders with knowledge of ongoing incidents 
- Identify probable origin for incidents and pinpoint which incidents were the likely origin of an issue to quickly narrow down search space

**Our 3-part blog series**


1. [AIOps: Supercharging IT and DevOps Teams](https://www.pagerduty.com/use-cases/aiops/)

2. [Orchestrate the Right Response for Every Incident](https://www.pagerduty.com/platform/modern-incident-response/)

3. [What's New](https://www.pagerduty.com/whats-new/)

## Increase Visibility

Provide real-time updates regarding your services to responders and stakeholders as well as eliminate silos between teams. Trigger PagerDuty incidents directly within Datadog.

## Resolve Issues Faster

Stay tuned for future enhancements to PagerDuty’s Datadog Incident Response widget — including powerful Event Intelligence features that help responders reduce their time-to-resolution by identifying active incidents alongside root-cause recommendations.
